00029 StateActionModelRef Predictor::model(const StateVectorRef &s)
00030 {
00031   StateRef p = prediction(m_planner->policy(s), NULL);
00032   propagate_changes();
00033   return p;

00035 
00036 void Predictor::propagate_changes()
00037 {
00038 //   std::cerr << "Predictor::propagate_changes(), "
00039 //          << predictions.size() << " predictions\n";
00040 
00041   std::set<StateWeakRef>::iterator i;
00042   for (i = m_inbox.begin(); i != m_inbox.end(); ++i)
00043     if (!i->expired())
00044       i->lock()->propagate_mdp_change();
00045 
00046   while (!m_pqueues[REWARD].empty()) {
00047     StateRef st = m_pqueues[REWARD].front();
00048     assert(st);
00049     st->zero_bound(REWARD);
00050     st->propagate_reward_change();
00051   }
00052 
00053   while (!m_pqueues[TRANSITION].empty()) {
00054     StateRef st = m_pqueues[TRANSITION].front();
00055     assert(st);
00056     st->zero_bound(TRANSITION);
00057     st->propagate_transitions_change();
00058   }
00059 
00060   // The propagate_reward_change() and propagate_transitions_change()
00061   // methods should add State objects to the inbox, as appropriate.
00062   for (i = m_inbox.begin(); i != m_inbox.end(); ++i)
00063     if (!i->expired())
00064       i->lock()->propagate_model_change();
00065   m_inbox.clear();
00066 }

00089 double Predictor::TerminalStatePrediction::predict_return(double p) const
00090 {
00091   return 0; // Can't earn additional reward after termination
00092 }
00093 
00094 void Predictor::TerminalStatePrediction::
00095 predict_terminals(EffectDistribution &term, double p) const
00096 {
00097   assert(p >= 0);
00098   EffectDistribution::value_type val(m_terminal, p);
00099   EffectDistribution::iterator i =
00100     std::lower_bound(term.begin(), term.end(), val,
00101                      LessFirst<EffectDistribution::value_type>());
00102   if (i == term.end() || m_terminal < i->first) // m_terminal not in term
00103     term.insert(i, val);
00104   else // i->first == m_terminal
00105     i->second += p;
00106 }

00116 Predictor::StateRef Predictor::State::
00117 create(const PredictorRef &predictor, const ModelBasedStatePolicyRef &policy,
00118        StateWeakRef &ref, StatePredictionWeakRef *ptr)
00119 {
00120   StateRef result(new State(predictor, policy));
00121   ref = result->m_this = result;
00122   if (ptr != NULL)
00123     *ptr = ref;
00124   policy->add_observer(result->m_this);
00125   result->m_mdp_state->add_observer(result->m_this);
00126   result->initialize();
00127   return result;
00128 }

00130 Predictor::State::State(const PredictorRef &predictor,
00131                         const ModelBasedStatePolicyRef &policy):
00132   m_predictor(predictor), m_mdp_state(policy->policy_model()),
00133   m_policy(policy), m_r(0.0)
00134 {
00135   for (unsigned idx = REWARD; idx <= TRANSITION; ++idx) {
00136     m_error_bounds[idx] = 0.0;
00137     m_heap_indices[idx] = -1;
00138   }
00139 }
00140 
00141 Predictor::State::~State()
00142 {
00143   SuccessorsContainer::iterator i;
00144   for (i = m_successors.begin(); i != m_successors.end(); ++i) {
00145     StatePredictionRef &successor = i->second.first;
00146     if (successor)
00147       successor->remove_predecessor(m_this);
00148   }
00149   m_policy->remove_observer(m_this);
00150   m_mdp_state->remove_observer(m_this);
00151 }

00168 double Predictor::State::predict_return(double p) const
00169 {
00170   assert(p >= 0);
00171   return p * m_r;
00172 }
00173 
00174 void Predictor::State::predict_terminals(EffectDistribution &term,
00175                                          double p) const
00176 {
00177   assert(std::isfinite(p));
00178   assert(p >= 0);
00179   EffectDistribution::const_iterator i;
00180   for (i = m_effect_map.begin(); i != m_effect_map.end(); ++i) {
00181     EffectDistribution::value_type val(i->first, p * i->second);
00182     assert(std::isfinite(val.second));
00183     assert(val.second >= 0);
00184     EffectDistribution::iterator j =
00185       std::lower_bound(term.begin(), term.end(), val,
00186                        LessFirst<EffectDistribution::value_type>());
00187     if (j == term.end() || val.first < j->first) // not already in term
00188       term.insert(j, val);
00189     else // j->first == val.first
00190       j->second += val.second;
00191   }
00192 }

00194 void Predictor::State::add_predecessor(const StateWeakRef &pred,
00195                                        double probability)
00196 {
00197   assert(!pred.expired());
00198   assert(std::isfinite(probability));
00199   assert(probability >= 0);
00200   vector_map_assoc(m_predecessors, pred, probability);
00201 }
00202 
00203 void Predictor::State::remove_predecessor(const StateWeakRef &pred)
00204 {
00205   vector_set_erase(m_predecessors,
00206                    std::pair<StateWeakRef, double>(pred, 0.0),
00207                    LessFirst<std::pair<StateWeakRef, double> >());
00208 }

00210 void Predictor::State::observe_MDP_change(const TaskRef &a)
00211 {
00212 //   std::cout << "Predictor::State::observe_MDP_change\n";
00213   assert(m_action != this->m_mdp_state->state_actions().end());
00214   if (a == m_action->first)
00215     m_predictor->m_inbox.insert(m_this);
00216 }

00218 void Predictor::State::observe_policy_change()
00219 {
00220 //   std::cout << "Predictor::observe_policy_change\n";
00221   m_predictor->m_inbox.insert(m_this);
00222 }

00224 void Predictor::State::initialize()
00225 {
00226 //   std::cout << "Predictor::State::initialize() " << *state() << "\n";
00227   m_action = vector_map_find(m_mdp_state->state_actions(),
00228                              m_policy->policy_action());
00229   assert(m_action != m_mdp_state->state_actions().end());
00230   propagate_mdp_change();
00231 }
00232 
00233 void Predictor::State::propagate_mdp_change()
00234 {
00235   if (m_action->first != m_policy->policy_action()) {
00236     m_action = vector_map_find(m_mdp_state->state_actions(),
00237                                m_policy->policy_action());
00238     assert(m_action != m_mdp_state->state_actions().end());
00239   }
00240   const StateDistribution &mdp_succs =
00241     m_action->second->successor_probabilities();
00242   StateDistribution::const_iterator a = mdp_succs.begin();
00243   SuccessorsContainer::iterator b = m_successors.begin();
00244   while (a != mdp_succs.end()) {
00245     while (b != m_successors.end() && b->first < a->first) {
00246       // Remove erstwhile successors.
00247       const StatePredictionRef &succ = b->second.first;
00248       if (succ)
00249         succ->remove_predecessor(m_this);
00250       b = m_successors.erase(b);
00251     }
00252     if (b == m_successors.end() || a->first < b->first) {
00253       // Add new successor.
00254       std::pair<StatePredictionRef, double> succ_weight;
00255       succ_weight.second = a->second;
00256       StatePredictionRef &succ = succ_weight.first;
00257       succ = m_predictor->prediction(a->first);
00258       succ->add_predecessor(m_this, a->second);
00259       // Use a NULL reference as a proxy for this to avoid maintain a
00260       // strong self-reference.
00261       if (succ.get() == this)
00262         succ.reset();
00263       SuccessorsContainer::value_type val(a->first, succ_weight);
00264       b = m_successors.insert(b, val);
00265     } else {
00266       // Update existing successor.
00267       assert(b->first == a->first);
00268       b->second.second = a->second;
00269     }
00270     ++a; ++b;
00271   }
00272   while (b != m_successors.end()) {
00273     // Remove erstwhile successors
00274     const StatePredictionRef &succ = b->second.first;
00275     succ->remove_predecessor(m_this);
00276     b = m_successors.erase(b);
00277   }
00278   propagate_reward_change();
00279   propagate_transitions_change();
00280 }
00281 
00282 void Predictor::State::propagate_reward_change()
00283 {
00284   // std::cerr << "propagate_reward_change() at " << m_mdp_state->state() << "\n";
00285   
00286   // Compute new estimated reward
00287   double backup = 0.0;
00288   SuccessorsContainer::const_iterator i;
00289   for (i = m_successors.begin(); i != m_successors.end(); ++i) {
00290     const StatePredictionRef &succ = i->second.first;
00291     const double p = i->second.second;
00292     assert(std::isfinite(p));
00293     assert(p >= 0);
00294     // NULL reference is a proxy for this
00295     const double ret = succ ? succ->predict_return(p) : predict_return(p);
00296     // std::cerr << "\t" << p << ": " << i->first << " -> " << ret << "\n";
00297     assert(std::isfinite(ret));
00298     backup += ret;
00299     // if (!std::isfinite(backup)) {
00300     //   std::cerr << "*this at " << state() << "\nthis is " << this << "\nsucc is " << succ << "\np was" << p << "\nret was " << ret << "\n";
00301     // }
00302   }
00303   assert(std::isfinite(backup));
00304   backup *= m_predictor->m_gamma;
00305   assert(std::isfinite(backup));
00306   assert(std::isfinite(m_action->second->reward()));
00307   // std::cerr << "\tr = " << m_action->second->reward() << "\n";
00308   backup += m_action->second->reward();
00309   // std::cerr << "\tsum = " << backup << "\n";
00310   assert(std::isfinite(backup));
00311 
00312   const double error = std::fabs(backup - m_r);
00313   assert(std::isfinite(error));
00314   assert(error >= 0);
00315   m_r = backup;
00316 
00317   // Propagate change to predecessors
00318   std::vector<std::pair<StateWeakRef, double> >::iterator j;
00319   for (j = m_predecessors.begin(); j != m_predecessors.end(); ++j) {
00320     StateRef pred(j->first);
00321     assert(pred);
00322     const double p = j->second;
00323     assert(p >= 0);
00324     pred->increase_bound(REWARD, p * error);
00325   }
00326 }
00327 
00328 void Predictor::State::propagate_transitions_change()
00329 {
00330   // Compute new transition probabilities.
00331   static EffectDistribution backup;
00332   backup.clear();
00333   SuccessorsContainer::const_iterator i;
00334   EffectDistribution::const_iterator a, b;
00335   for (i = m_successors.begin(); i != m_successors.end(); ++i) {
00336     const StatePredictionRef &succ = i->second.first;
00337     const double &one_step_transition_probability = i->second.second;
00338     if (succ)
00339       succ->predict_terminals(backup, one_step_transition_probability);
00340     else // NULL reference is a proxy for this
00341       predict_terminals(backup, one_step_transition_probability);
00342   }
00343 
00344   // Compute L1 error, for propagation threshold purposes
00345   double error = 0.0;
00346   a = backup.begin();
00347   b = m_effect_map.begin();
00348   while (a != backup.end()) {
00349     while (b != m_effect_map.end() && b->first < a->first) {
00350       error += b->second;
00351       ++b;
00352     }
00353     if (b == m_effect_map.end() || a->first < b->first) {
00354       error += a->second;
00355     } else {
00356       error += std::fabs(a->second - b->second);
00357       ++b;
00358     }
00359     ++a;
00360   }
00361   while (b != m_effect_map.end()) {
00362     error += b->second;
00363     ++b;
00364   }
00365   m_effect_map.swap(backup); // Swapping cheaper than copying.
00366 
00367   // Propagate to predecessors
00368   assert(error >= 0);
00369   std::vector<std::pair<StateWeakRef, double> >::iterator j;
00370   for (j = m_predecessors.begin(); j != m_predecessors.end(); ++j) {
00371     assert(j->second >= 0);
00372     StateRef predecessor(j->first);
00373     assert(predecessor);
00374     predecessor->increase_bound(TRANSITION, j->second * error);
00375   }
00376 }
00377 
00378 void Predictor::State::propagate_model_change()
00379 {
00380   notify_model_observers();
00381 }
00382 
00383 void Predictor::State::increase_bound(queue_t idx, double increase)
00384 {
00385   assert(increase >= 0);
00386   double &error_bound = m_error_bounds[idx];
00387   error_bound += increase;
00388   if (error_bound > m_predictor->m_epsilon) {
00389     int &heap_index = m_heap_indices[idx];
00390     if (heap_index < 0) {
00391       std::vector<StateRef> &pqueue = m_predictor->m_pqueues[idx];
00392       heap_index = static_cast<int>(pqueue.size());
00393       pqueue.push_back(m_this.lock());
00394     }
00395     insert_heapify(idx);
00396   }
00397 }
00398 
00399 void Predictor::State::heapify(queue_t idx)
00400 {
00401   int &heap_index = m_heap_indices[idx];
00402   if (heap_index >= 0) {
00403     std::vector<StateRef> &pqueue = m_predictor->m_pqueues[idx];
00404     assert(pqueue[heap_index].get() == this);
00405     unsigned child_index = 2*heap_index + 1; // identify children
00406     while (child_index < pqueue.size()) { // as long as there's a child...
00407       StateRef *child = &pqueue[child_index];
00408       assert((*child)->m_heap_indices[idx] == static_cast<int>(child_index));
00409       unsigned other_child_index = child_index + 1;
00410       if (other_child_index < pqueue.size()) {
00411         StateRef *other_child = &pqueue[other_child_index];
00412         assert((*other_child)->m_heap_indices[idx] ==
00413                static_cast<int>(other_child_index));
00414         // find the bigger child
00415         if ((*child)->m_error_bounds[idx] <
00416             (*other_child)->m_error_bounds[idx]) {
00417           child = other_child;
00418           child_index = other_child_index;
00419         }
00420       }
00421       if (m_error_bounds[idx] < (*child)->m_error_bounds[idx]) {
00422         // if out errorbound is bigger than child's
00423         child->swap(pqueue[heap_index]); // swap spots with child
00424         // give child our index
00425         pqueue[heap_index]->m_heap_indices[idx] = heap_index;
00426         heap_index = child_index; // and take the child's index
00427         child_index = 2 * child_index + 1;
00428       } else
00429         break;
00430     }
00431   }
00432 }
00433 
00434 void Predictor::State::insert_heapify(queue_t idx)
00435 {
00436   int &heap_index = m_heap_indices[idx];
00437   std::vector<StateRef> &pqueue = m_predictor->m_pqueues[idx];
00438   assert(heap_index < 0 || pqueue[heap_index].get() == this);
00439   while (heap_index > 0) {
00440     int parent_index = (heap_index - 1)/2;
00441     StateRef *parent = &pqueue[parent_index];
00442     assert((*parent)->m_heap_indices[idx] == parent_index);
00443     if (m_error_bounds[idx] <= (*parent)->m_error_bounds[idx])
00444       break;
00445     parent->swap(pqueue[heap_index]); // Swap with parent
00446     // parent takes my index
00447     pqueue[heap_index]->m_heap_indices[idx] = heap_index;
00448     heap_index = parent_index; // I take parent's index
00449   }
00450 }
00451 
00452 void Predictor::State::dequeue(queue_t idx)
00453 {
00454   int &heap_index = m_heap_indices[idx];
00455   assert(heap_index >= 0);
00456   std::vector<StateRef> &pqueue = m_predictor->m_pqueues[idx];
00457   StateRef *hole = &pqueue[heap_index];
00458   hole->swap(pqueue.back()); // Swap spots with back
00459   pqueue.pop_back(); // remove back in vector
00460   if (heap_index != static_cast<int>(pqueue.size())) {
00461     const StateRef old_back = *hole;
00462 
00463     // Give the old back element our index.
00464     old_back->m_heap_indices[idx] = heap_index;
00465 
00466     // Move old back element toward front if necessary (unlikely)
00467     if (heap_index > 0)
00468       old_back->insert_heapify(idx);
00469 
00470     // Move old back toward back if necessary.
00471     old_back->heapify(idx);
00472   }
00473   heap_index = -1; // remove this DecisionState from queue
00474 }
00475 
00476 Predictor::StateRef Predictor::
00477 prediction(const ModelBasedStatePolicyRef &pi_s, StatePredictionWeakRef *ptr)
00478 {
00479   StateWeakRef &st = m_predictions[pi_s->state()];
00480   if (st.expired())
00481     return State::create(m_this.lock(), pi_s, st, ptr);
00482   else
00483     return st.lock();
00484 }
00485 
00486 Predictor::StatePredictionRef Predictor::prediction(const StateVectorRef &s)
00487 {
00488   StatePredictionWeakRef &st = m_succ_predictions[s];
00489   if (st.expired()) {
00490     if ((*m_terminalp)(s))
00491       return TerminalStatePrediction::create(s, m_dimensions, st);
00492     else
00493       return prediction(m_planner->policy(s), &st);
00494   } else
00495     return st.lock();
00496 }
